summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons forms from July 31, 2019, primarily detailing prisoner remands, releases, and transfers to/from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. It includes a specific remand order for Jeffrey Epstein and release authorizations for other inmates.

events.title: Epstein Remanded to MCC New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is formally remanded to the custody of the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York via a prisoner remand order.

events.title: Release of Inmates from Special Housing Unit
events.description: Several inmates, including Jonathan Carrillo, Benjamin Lucre, Christian Navedo, and Cesar Sayoc, are authorized for release from the Special Housing Unit at MCC New York.

events.title: Multiple Prisoner Remands and Releases
events.description: A series of administrative prisoner remands, releases, and transfers occur at MCC New York involving numerous individuals.

locations: MCC New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
Metropolitan Correction Center New York NY 10007
Community Solutions, Inc. 21 Cliff Street Waterbury, CT 06710
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is listed on a prisoner remand order dated July 31, 2019, to be delivered to the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The document includes a memorandum authorizing the release of several inmates, including Cesar Sayoc, from the Special Housing Unit at MCC New York on July 31, 2019.
Multiple standard Bureau of Prisons forms (remand orders, release authorizations, transfer receipts) are compiled, showing routine prison administrative activity on that date.
The documents are administrative and do not contain details about the charges against Epstein or the other inmates.
The presence of Epstein's name on a remand form indicates he was in the custody process on this date, shortly before his death in August 2019.
